page.title: 06INDUSTRY
page.content: The industries at Heathhall are varied in age as well as product e.g. the {Uniroyal}factory has been established for 85 years, whereas the {Express {Bakery} is only 12 years old. There is also difference in the number of employees. The{Uniroyal,}which is the larger of the 2 factories has 881, where the{Express Bakery}only has 35 employees. About 90% of these employees live in Dumfries. The other 10% have to travel a short distance to work. Rubber products are made by{ {Uniroyal}e.g. footwear, conveyor belts, carpet underlay. The bakery makes a mouthwatering variety, e.g. potato scones, baps and many different types of cakes, cream and otherwise. Both factories get their raw materials by road haulage and by sea.
